sentences.en: a picture of sunrise over Mount Fuji
By sunrise tomorrow we'll be on our way.
sentences.cn: 明天天亮前我们就将赶路。

sentences.en: He quickly looked at her and said, " It's great. A sunrise shot. "
sentences.cn: 他扫了她一眼说: “ 太棒了, 正好拍日出照. ”

sentences.en: I have, however, seen a superbly majestic and beautiful sunrise.
sentences.cn: 但是, 我却看到了一次最雄伟、最瑰丽的日出景象.

sentences.en: The sunrise at the seaside was quite a sight to behold.
The sunrise seen from high in the mountains was a tremendous spectacle.
sentences.cn: 从山上居高远望,日出景象蔚为奇观.

sentences.en: The sunrise was a beautiful scene.
The sunset rivalled the sunrise in beauty.
sentences.cn: 日落与日出的景色一样美.

sentences.en: The sunset rivals the sunrise in beauty.
There was a spectacular sunrise yesterday.
This region is celebrated for its views of the sunrise.
sentences.cn: 这是出名的看日出的胜地.

sentences.en: Viewed from the top of Mount Tai , the sunrise was indeed a spectacle.
sentences.cn: 从泰山顶上看去, 日出真是个奇观.

sentences.en: We came here expressly to see the sunrise.
sentences.cn: 我们到这里来就是为了看日出.

trans.tran_cn: 日出（时分），黎明，<诗>日出的地方，东方
trans.tran_en: the time when the sun first appears in the morning
